descriptor_text: Can narrate past experiences, linking events in sequence and adding reactions or comments.
pragmatics: Use sequencing markers; add evaluative closing
lesson_hooks: Oral presentation summarising an anecdote; interview follow-up
notes: Source: CEFR Companion Volume 2020, PCIC B1 Narración

descriptor_text: Can express and defend a viewpoint on familiar matters, giving reasons and acknowledging different opinions.
target_functions: Argumentar a favor/en contra; matizar opiniones
lesson_hooks: Debate informal; complaint response with justification
notes: Source: CEFR Companion Volume 2020, PCIC B1 Opiniones

descriptor_text: Can negotiate solutions to service or product issues, explaining the problem and proposing or responding to alternatives.
pragmatics: Mitigate requests with condicional (¿podría...?); acknowledge effort
notes: Source: PCIC B1 Vida cotidiana – Consumo; DELE B1 Interacción Oral T3

descriptor_text: Can make plans with others, suggesting options, negotiating constraints, and agreeing on next steps.
pragmatics: Use softeners (¿te parece si...?), clarify logistics
frequency_focus: Ensure connectors for sequencing and conditionals
lesson_hooks: Planning meeting for weekend trip; project coordination
notes: Source: CEFR Companion Volume 2020, PCIC B1 Organización de actividades

descriptor_text: Can relay the main points of clear texts or conversations on familiar topics, highlighting essential facts for someone who was absent.
lesson_hooks: Meeting recap; summarising a phone call
notes: Source: CEFR Companion Volume 2020, Mediation B1; requires creation of mediation-specific KG nodes

descriptor_text: Can sustain informal conversations, exchanging personal news and showing interest in others' experiences.
pragmatics: Use follow-up questions and empathic responses
lesson_hooks: Warm-up chat before task; reconnecting with a friend
